trustfund:
TF040098-ALBANIA-ASSISTANCE TO THE
            FINANCIAL SECTOR TEAM- BANKING PRIVATIZATION,TF039124-AZERBAIJAN - ASSISTANCE TO THE
            FINANCIAL SECTOR TEAM

abstracts.cdata!:
The Financial Sector Technical
            Assistance Project will assist the Government of Azerbaijan
            implement, and develop its financial sector strategy,
            through a technical assistance (TA) focused on bank
            restructuring, and divestiture, and, by enhancing banking
            infrastructure, and supervision. The main components will:
            1) provide advisory services to the United Universal Joint
            Stock Bank (BUSbank) in strengthening, and improving its
            organization, and operation. It includes a foreign advisor
            to provide TA in the transformation of the Agroprom Bank
            into Agrarcredit, a non-bank credit institution, in addition
            to overseeing the privatization of the BUSbank. A resident
            advisor will supervise the bank's managerial/prudential
            activities, while short-term advisors, and consultants will
            assist in the implementation of new international accounting
            standards, and, in information technology, and management
            information systems; 2) strengthen the capacity of the
            Azerbaijan National Bank (ANB), supported by advisory
            services in its strategy formulation, banking supervision,
            and infrastructure. Funds will be provided for
            hardware/software, needed to finalize implementation of the
            payment system reform, and, for the expansion of ANB's
            general ledger system; and, 3) provide project management,
            and administration support, through procurement advisors,
            while incremental operating costs will also be financed.
